DPRK FM Leaves for Beijing
articles.content:
DPRK FM Leaves for Beijing
   Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun and his party left here Tuesday to visit China.
 He was seen off at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il, officials concerned and the Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Member of Federal Assembly of Germany and His Party Arrive
articles.content:
Member of Federal Assembly of Germany and His Party Arrive
   Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Member of the Federal Assembly of Germany Johannes Plug and his party arrived here on Tuesday.
 They were greeted at the airport by Chairman of the Korea-Germany Friendship Parliamentary Group Ri Jong Hyok who is deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and German Ambassador to the DPRK Friedrich Ludwig Loehr.

articles.title: Venezuelan Foreign Ministry Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Venezuelan Foreign Ministry Delegation Arrives
   Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Venezuelan Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Vice-Minister Alcides Daniel Rondon Rivero arrived here on Tuesday.
 It was greeted at the airport by officials concerned and the Cuban ambassador to the DPRK.
